summary: This is an FBI FD-1023 form documenting intelligence from a confidential human source. The document relates to a 2020 election influence threat assessment and mentions Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking in the context of potential foreign influence by Israel and Russia on U.S. officials.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Mentioned in the synopsis in relation to child sex trafficking as part of a broader intelligence assessment on foreign influence.

events.title: 2020 Election Influence Threat Assessment
events.description: FBI intelligence assessment regarding potential foreign influence on U.S. officials during the 2020 election, with mentions of Israel and Russia.

locations: FBI Los Angeles Area of Responsibility
keyFacts: The document is an FBI FD-1023 form, used for reporting information from confidential human sources.
It is dated October 19, 2020, and is part of a 2020 election influence threat assessment.
The synopsis explicitly links the assessment to Jeffrey Epstein and child sex trafficking.
The assessment concerns potential foreign influence on U.S. officials by Israel and Russia.
The document is marked UNCLASSIFIED//FOUO (For Official Use Only).
